data.description:
Step on the podium and become a true orchestra conductor in Maestro: The Masterclass. Play hands free or grab a chopstick and master the real hands motions that command the orchestra through an off the rail conducting masterclass that culminates with an epic symphonic concert in a packed opera house. Good luck, Maestro!

- Step into a gorgeous opera house packed with a thousand music fans, face a mammoth orchestra of over two hundred virtuosos, and get ready to throw some serious power moves.
- Learn to beat tempo, cue musicians or guide crescendos with the power of your hands only
- Conduct all music genres from Electro to Jazz, Hip Hop and finish up with an epic Symphonic music concert to become a true Maestro!

Maestri! 
We're excited to announce a new update for Maestro: The Masterclass. We have some improvements for you!

9 new languages:
- English
- Spanish
- Italian
- French 
- German 
- Japanese 
- Korean 
- Russian  
- Chinese (trad./simpl.) 

Performance improvements:
- Musicians are now rendered at different frame rates giving us some extra performance.
- HMD state polling optimisation, regular checks such as input validity or whether the headset is being worn are done less often.

Bug fixes:
- Input pop-ups can no longer be displayed during level transitions.
- Fermata and Dynamics validation conditions adjustments.
- Audio adjustments throughout the game.
- Interface anti-aliasing visual improvements.

Other updates:
- New hand tracking system, with new hand models. 
- The baton is now automatically adjusted based on the hand pose.
